name: Gideon Roman
description: Based on a Roman character set, Gideon is a traditional typeface with classic forms. Perfect for uses from invitations, greeting cards and menus, to display advertising. The upper case letters have a tradition Roman feel that adds warmth and sophistication to text while the legibility allows for larger blocks of copy to be easily read. Gideon comes with Latin Character sets including Western, Central, and Vietnamese language support. To contribute, see github.com/googlefonts/gideon .
author: Robert Leuschke
